name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Scrappers_Strike_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Scrappers Strike F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Increases your chance to critically hit with all of your primary powers against players and minions by 3% and boosts your chance to critically hit by 6% against most other enemies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Scrappers and may be slotted into any Scrapper damage power.
power_display_names: Superior Scrapper's Strike: Recharge/Critical Hit Bonus
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Critical Hit Chance Increase
